Owusu Kwabena (amụrụ na 18 June 1997), nke a maara dị ka Owusu, bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere otu Azerbaijan Qarabağ na otu mba Ghana.
A mụrụ Owusu na Accra, wee kwaga Spain na 2016
Mgbe ọ nwesịrị ule na Racing de Santander na AD Alcorcón B, ọ sonyeere CD Toledo na mbinye ego n'August, na-ekenye ya na mbụ na nchekwa na Tercera División.
Owusu mere nnukwu mpụta mbụ ya na 31 Ọgọst 2016, na-abịa dị ka onye nọchiri anya ọkara nke abụọ wee nweta goolu ndị otu ya niile na mmeri 2–0 n'ụlọ megide UB Conquense, maka oge Copa del Rey
O mechara bụrụ onye na-ebido ụlọ ọgbakọ ahụ mgbe niile, na-ebute goolu asatọ ka ndị otu ya tụfuru nkwalite n'asọmpị ahụ.

N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2017, Owusu bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ ise ya na CD Leganés nke La Liga. Ụbọchị asatọ ka e mesịrị, a gbazinyere ya Real Oviedo na Segunda División, maka otu afọ.
